work.name: Joyy Inc.
work.summary: Designed and implemented scalable machine learning models to enhance video recommendation algorithms, efficiently improve pivotal user metrics, including new user retention, video engagement rate, viewing duration, and beyond. Utilized techniques such as collaborative filtering, XgBoost, and deep learning (using TensorFlow and PyTorch).
highlights: Machine learning, recommendation system, data analytics, data visualization

work.name: Oracle China R & D Center
work.summary: Full-stack development for implementing dashboards for Oracle SaaS cloud computing platform, empowering customers with real-time data visualization interface for seamless monitoring and management of computing resource.
highlights: Full-stack development, cloud computing, data visualization
